rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon.state

Class ShootingState

  • java.lang.Object
    • rekit.util.state.State
      • rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon.state.CannonState
        • rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon.state.ChargingState
          • rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon.state.ShootingState

  • public class ShootingState
extends ChargingState

    IMA FIRIN MAH LAZOR!

    Fourth and last CannonState of the State that represents the phase where the Cannon unleashed his fierce and widow-creating laser beam.

    The beam consists of a number of CannonParticles that will be spawned one at a time until colliding with the Player or an Inanimate.

    It extends the ChargingState to enable the shaking effect.

    Author:
    Angelo Aracri

      Must supply a fully instantiated State that the parenting TimeStateMachine will enter after this State is out of time as specified in State.getTimerTime().
      long getTimerTime()
      Must supply the time in millis how long the TimeStateMachine is supposed to be in this State before switching to the next as specified in State.getNextState().

      Method that is periodically called by the TimeStateMachine.

      Method whose return value will be multiplied to the shaking effects x-delta to effectively control its strength.
